text: Noma okunye kwezinye izinto ezidaliwe ezinkulu (ezibukhuni) ezifubeni zenu ngakho-ke bayothi, “ngubani oyosibuyisela emumva ekuphileni na? Ithi “yilowo owanidalayo ngesikhathi sokuqala” ngakho-ke bayonqankuzisela amakhanda abo kuwena bese bethi, “kuyokwenzeka nini lokho” ithi “Mhlawumbe kuseduzane”
